remarks: Deduction version of ~ hbsb .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2013.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 23-Mar-2018.)
statement:
hbsbd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbsbd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. z ph ) $.
hbsbd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. z ps ) ) $.
hbsbd $p |- ( ph -> ( [ y / x ] ps -> A. z [ y / x ] ps ) ) $.
$d y z $.
